overview_of_class:
The teaching practicum encompasses a ten-week period of part-time experience under the direction of two classroom mentors designated by the cooperating school. It is performed at two different sites - urban and suburban, is organized in conjunction with a subject-specific methods tutorial, and is accompanied by a weekly practicum seminar.

The seminar portion of the course is designed to enrich the practicum/observation experience for secondary teaching math and science candidates. Through whole class and small group discussion, course participants will have opportunities to share their observations, questions, and reflections. Each week various topics of teaching and learning will be addressed which will help prepare course participants for student teaching.
name: Theory and Practice of Teaching: Secondary Math/Science
subject: MS_ED
